subject: Kentucky Oaks Horse Race
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horses
lead_paragraph: It was an emotional finish for the trainer Larry Jones, who nearly died in a riding accident last year, and Kerwin Clark, 56, the oldest jockey to win the Oaks.
snippet: It was an emotional finish for the trainer Larry Jones, who nearly died in a riding accident last year, and Kerwin Clark, 56, the oldest jockey to win the Oaks.
